statements: UPDATE sales_data SET dish_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', price = 15.99 WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_data SET sales_count = 100, dish_name = 'Margherita Pizza' WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
UPDATE sales_data SET price = 15.99, sales_count = 100 WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_data SET dish_name = 'Spicy Chicken Pasta', price = 12.50 WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
UPDATE cuisine_sales SET total_sales = 5000.50 WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE dish_popularity SET sales_count = 1000 WHERE dish_id = 2;
UPDATE cuisine_sales SET total_sales = total_sales + 5000 WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE dish_popularity SET sales_count = sales_count * 1.1, dish_name = 'Updated Dish' WHERE dish_id = 2;
UPDATE cuisines SET cuisine_name = 'Italian' WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE dishes SET price = 15.99 WHERE dish_id = 2;
UPDATE cuisines SET cuisine_name = 'Italian' WHERE cuisine_id = 1;

UPDATE dish SET price=15.99 WHERE dish_name='Spaghetti' AND cuisine_id=1;
